_description: A religious love parody — seven 6-line stanzas

VandADyce45.First Lines: Swete harte be trweChaunge for [no] newe…
VandADyce45.Last Lines: …Take the to mercyeAnd delyver the owte of payne

Greene,  Richard Leighton,
                        ed.

Clarendon Medieval and Tudor Series.
